article.title: U.S. Army Modifies Robotics Contract
article.text: Foster-Miller, Waltham, Massachusetts, was awarded a $35,400,000 modification (P00013) to contract W56HZV-11-D-0057 for tactically adaptable light ordnance neutralization, family of robots, sustainment, maintenance and repair parts.Â Work locations and funding will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of September 14, 2016. The Army Contracting Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
